body.instruction: Identify whether each sentence or question below contains a relative pronoun, interrogative pronoun, or interrogative adjective. Then select each card to check your answer.
body.instruction_textversion: Identify whether each sentence or question below contains a relative pronoun, interrogative pronoun, or interrogative adjective. Then check your answer.

back.content:
interrogative adjective


For which Roman has the servant prepared dinner?
back.textversion:
Show Answer

interrogative adjective

For which Roman has the servant prepared dinner?

front.content: Quid milites Romani vastaverunt, et quid Hannibal fecit?

back.content:
interrogative pronoun


What did the Roman soldiers destroy, and what did Hannibal make?
back.textversion:
Show Answer

interrogative pronoun

What did the Roman soldiers destroy, and what did Hannibal make?

front.content: Femina ob litteras, quae a coniunge amissae erant, lacrimavit.
front.textversion: Femina ob litteras, quae a coniunge amissae erant, lacrimavit.

back.content:
relative pronoun


The woman cried on account of the letters, which had been send by her husband.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

relative pronoun

The woman cried on account of the letters, which had been send by her husband.

front.content: Iuventus, cui magnum gaudium habeo, est comes Aeneae.
front.textversion: Iuventus, cui magnum gaudium habeo, est comes Aeneae.

back.content:
relative pronoun


The young man, for whom I have great joy, is a companion of Aeneas.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

relative pronoun

The young man, for whom I have great joy, is a companion of Aeneas.

back.content:
interrogative pronoun


Whom do the Vestal maidens praise?
back.textversion:
Show Answer

interrogative pronoun

Whom do the Vestal maidens praise?

front.content: Qui mendicus a cani suo cretus erat?
front.textversion: Qui mendicus a cani suo cretus erat?

back.content:
interrogative adjective


Which beggar had been discerned by his own dog?
back.textversion:
Show Answer

interrogative adjective

Which beggar had been discerned by his own dog?
